item.title: Maternal Deaths in Karnataka: 5 More Maternal Deaths Reported in Raichur and Chitradurga Amid Growing Concerns Over Medical Negligence
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru, December 11: Amid furore over a series of maternal deaths in Karnataka, five more casualties have been reported from Raichur and Chitradurga districts. The incident of four maternal deaths from Sindhanur Taluk Government Hospital in October has come to light. The deceased were identified as Chandrakala (26), Renukamma (32), Mousami Mandal (22) and Channamma (25).
In October, among the 300 pregnant women who gave birth, seven turned critical and four died. All victims had undergone ce...]]>
item.author: Arshad Raza
